title: TO DO
description: Todo is a web application for task management developed in JavaScript using React and Vite. It allows users to create, filter, and manage their tasks through an intuitive interface. The application supports multiple filters and a reactive interface, making it a convenient and effective tool for organizing workflows.

title: LAMODA
description: This project is an online store developed using React and functional components, featuring multiple filtering options for an enhanced user experience. It allows users to filter and sort products, ensuring a convenient and interactive shopping experience.

title: API & SPA
description: This is a multi-page application developed using React and react-router-dom. The application interacts with the external API (JSONPlaceholder) to retrieve data about users and albums. The main goal of the project is to demonstrate skills in routing, component usage, and adaptive design.

title: NOTION
description: This application allows users to create, edit, and delete notes. Built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS, it features user registration, authentication, and a user-friendly interface for managing notes. The app ensures data validation and provides a seamless experience with pagination and search capabilities.

title: LANDING FOR PIZZERIA
description: This project is a responsive landing page for TMIN, a pizzeria and bakery. It built with HTML, CSS (using Flexbox), and JavaScript, the design adapts seamlessly to various screen sizes and includes a functional hamburger menu for mobile navigation.
